title: Dynamic HZ000250 4 Sided Bucket Grid for Paint Bucket, 5-Gallon, 9-Inch, Plated Metal
features: Paint right out of the can
Eliminates need for trays and liners
description: For top quality products for all your painting and decorating needs, look to the Dynamic brand. From specialty paint brushes, rollers and faux finish applicators to wallpaper tools and accessories, Dynamic products come in do-it-yourself or professional contractor grades for the best in quality, innovation and value. Eliminate the need for expensive paint trays and liners with the Dynamic Bucket Grid. This easy to use 4 sided bucket grid allows you to save time and money by painting right out of the paint bucket. Constructed of durable plated metal, the Dynamic Bucket Grid comes in 1, 2 and 5 gallon sizes. Get painting.
